title: The Story of Me, a Boy Versatile in Housework, Taking Care of a Solitary (?) but Beautiful Girl from Morning till Night - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clumsy Love Interests   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: 鼈甲飴雨
description:
Kannonzaka Kyoya, a tough but slightly unsocial high school boy, is also referred as to “Okan” because of his versatile ability to do all household chores.

The part-time job he was introduced to, with expectations of his household ability, was to take care of his classmate in his high school,  Takanashi Inori, who is well known as a solitary beautiful girl.

But the truth about Takanashi is that she’s actually clumsy, pitiful and bad at communicating.

“T-that! My panties?! D-Don’t Look!”

“You’re so loud. I’m doing the laundry, give me that.”

The half-living school romantic-comedy where they are together from morning to night, has become!>
